Html:
I have downloaded SQL SERVER 2005 Express and the AdventureWorks DB. I'm
running windoss XP. I have copied (from a MS .NET book) a C# program in Visual Studio
2005 to connect & read the dbase. THe connection string is
@"server=.\sqlexpress;Integrated Security=SSPI;initial
catalog=AdventureWorks".
When I run the program, I get an exception when it trys to connect: {"Cannot
open database \"AdventureWorks\" requested by the login. The login
failed.\r\nLogin failed for user 'MALCOLM\\Magic'."} System.Exception
{System.Data.SqlClient.SqlException}, where MALCOLM is the computer name &
MAGIC is the account. THis account has admin privileges. I have created
another acoount on my computer & get the same result. I can 'login' to SQL
Server Manager Studio Express.
It works fine on another computer - so it must be my computer's config.
HOw can I dig deeper into this problem & understand what's causing it?
PROBLEM SOLVED - apparently you have to first ATTACH the dbase in Visusl Studio
